item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI O3-Mini (540 points | 542 comments)
2. Bypass DeepSeek censorship by speaking in hex (306 points | 180 comments)
3. Small plane crashes in Northeast Philadelphia (33 points | 36 comments)
4. Notes on OpenAI O3-Mini (18 points | 2 comments)
5. Sparrow, a Modern C++ Implementation of the Apache Arrow Columnar Format (27 points | discuss)
6. Add "fucking" to your Google searches to neutralize AI summaries (439 points | 206 comments)
7. Falsehoods programmers believe about null pointers (12 points | 1 comment)
8. Earthstar – A database for private, distributed, offline-first applications (11 points | discuss)
9. Elite on the 6502: The original 6502 assembly source, heavily commented (117 points | 22 comments)
10. FBI, Dutch police disrupt 'Manipulaters' phishing gang (100 points | 32 comments)
11. The Tensor Cookbook (92 points | 10 comments)
12. Show HN: Uscope, a new Linux debugger written from scratch (179 points | 98 comments)
13. Show HN: Lua-libuv – A Lua with libuv experiments (18 points | 1 comment)
14. FurtherAI (YC W24) Is Hiring engineers and researchers to build Vertical AI agents ( | hide)
15. Show HN: Simple to build MCP servers that easily connect with custom LLM calls (4 points | discuss)
16. Designing Great Watchdog Timers for Embedded Systems (17 points | 2 comments)
17. Web Analytics Accidentally Collecting Passwords (21 points | 3 comments)
18. Theoretical limitations of multi-layer Transformer (75 points | 12 comments)
19. Zusie – My Relay Computer (94 points | 28 comments)
20. LinuxPDF (50 points | 5 comments)
21. Fixing E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial for the Atari 2600 (2013) (96 points | 32 comments)
22. Large Language Models Think Too Fast to Explore Effectively (72 points | 19 comments)
23. Google offers 'voluntary exit' to all US platforms and devices employees (50 points | 1 comment)
24. All CDC data is no longer visible to comply with executive orders (19 points | 1 comment)
25. When Greedy Algorithms Can Be Faster [C++] (26 points | 6 comments)
26. Better Know a Ruby Thing: Singleton Classes (77 points | 10 comments)
27. Shell-ish scripting in Go with ease (100 points | 31 comments)
28. Living with Nausea: My Story in Six Charts (103 points | 49 comments)
29. Instagram and Facebook Blocked and Hid Abortion Pill Providers' Posts (224 points | 136 comments)
30. Images reveal exocomets around nearby stars (83 points | 11 comments)
